snippet.title: Towers of Aghasba: Early Access Gameplay Showcase + Release Date Announcement!
snippet.description:
Towers of Aghasba - Early Access Release Date Announcement Trailer | Launching November 19, 2024!

The wait is almost over! Towers of Aghasba launches on November 19, 2024, in Early Access, inviting you to step into an awe-inspiring world brimming with life, mystery, and adventure.

As the junior architect of the Shimu people, it’s your mission to rebuild villages and restore ecosystems after a devastating force known as the Withered ravaged your homeland. Traverse vast landscapes, scale towering mountains, and discover the secrets hidden within the wilds of Aghasba. 

- Explore and Rebuild: Design and construct your civilization, from vibrant villages to flourishing ecosystems.
- Battle the Withered: Arm yourself with crafted weapons, armor, and elixirs to fight back the rot.
- Nurture Life: Cultivate outlandish flora and fauna to restore the balance of nature.
- Adventure with Friends: Invite up to three friends to explore your custom island, trade resources, and take on the challenges of Aghasba together.

Mark your calendars for November 19, 2024, and be part of the journey to rebuild a fallen world!

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/towers-games-556242487476486154

Wishlist on Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2178070/Towers_of_Aghasba/
Wishlist on the Sony store: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010067

Website: https://www.dreamlit.games

Follow us on all our socials!
-  X:   / https://x.com/DreamlitGames
- Facebook:   / https://facebook.com/DreamlitGames
- Instagram:   / https://instagram.com/dreamlitgames/

About Dreamlit Games
Dreamlit Games is a small, but ambitious indie studio started in 2020. We're a fully remote team that is spread all around the world! Our immensely talented and passionate DREAM team is committed to building an incredible open-world experience while maintaining a positive and healthy work culture.
